mapper.update: update caedepartment set departmentNumber = #{departmentnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isEffective = #{iseffective,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where departmentId = #{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select departmentId, departmentNumber, `name`, isEffective, startTime, endTime from caedepartment
